name: Prime Advocates
slogan: Boutique impact investment advisory firm (legal, business and metrics)
description: Prime Advocates is a not-for-profit law firm and social finance consultancy providing legal, impact metrics and  advisory support to a range of clients including impact investors, social enterprises and responsible businesses. As a social impact market maker, we support clients who are seeking to positively influence the UN SDGs.  Prime Advocates’ unique not-for-profit business model creates a continuous cycle of positive social change. Revenue generated from our fee-paying clients subsidises the pro-bono/low-bono support we provide to innovative social enterprise start-ups who would otherwise not be supported. Alongside the provision of legal, financial, strategic consultancy and impact metric consulting, we accelerate the development of social finance through best practice tools and knowledge sharing. This work is undertaken through the impact projects of our charitable arm, the Prime Advocates Foundation. All our profits are returned to this Foundation to further our purpose.

team.name: anthony murphy
team.bioHtml: Impact, hedge fund and PE lawyer, business strategist and entrepreneur. Worked at Weil, Bear Stearns,  and JP Morgan before founding Prime

jobs.title: Impact Project Lead & Senior Associate
jobs.description: Www.primeadvocates.com: is looking for a impact programme manager and fundraising manager. We have a number of initiatives - but our scaled programmes are: i) Women of Impact (a mentorship, legal and business acceleration programme) supporting women lead and women empowering social enterprises; ii)  www.osei-academy.com a international vocational school initiative based in Ghana (bring about garment fabrication standardisation and artisan business development). Some involvement in our generic coverage. Looking for a professional with programme and some fundraising experience with good academics and professional business experience  (consultancy, legal, accountancy)
